full_summary:
### Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Title**: Eaton 9PX UPS RACK/TOWER KIT PERP 9PX3000RT with NETWORK-MS
*   **Solicitation Number**: BPM017117/20388
*   **Publication Date**: 2022-10-07
*   **Closing Date**: 2022-10-28T14:00:00
*   **Modification Date**: 2022-10-28
*   **Solicitation Status**: Expired
*   **GSIN Code**: N7025 (ADP Input-Output and Storage Devices)
*   **Procurement Category**: Government of Canada (GD)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB)
*   **Region of Opportunity**: Canada
*   **Region of Delivery**: Alberta
*   **Contracting Entity Name**: Shared Services Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON, K0A 0C3, Canada

### Description of Requirement

Shared Services Canada (SSC) has a requirement for the provision of an Eaton 9PX UPS RACK/TOWER KIT PERP 9PX3000RT with NETWORK-MS. 

### Security and Trade Agreement Requirements

*   Security requirement: This solicitation does not contain a requirement for vendor and personnel security screening.
*   Trade agreements: The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB).

### Submission Instructions

*   The final closing date for a submission of a proposal is October 28, 2022, at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT).
*   Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to: tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca.
*   The link to the P2P Portal to access the BPM solicitation is:
    https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public
    (BPM017117 Eaton 9PX UPS RACK/TOWER KIT PERP 9PX3000RT with NETWORK-MS 
    SSC Eaton 9PX UPS RACK/TOWER KIT PERP 9PX3000RT with NETWORK-MS- Amendment 001) 

### Contact Information

You can contact Eric Lavigne at eric.lavigne@ssc-s
